title: MC打不开
txt_content:
我一点论坛就弹出 
 Discuz! Database ErrorThe database has encountered a problem. Need Help?Error messages:[Type] 查询语句错误[126] Incorrect key file for table '/tmp/#sql_96a_0.MYI'; try to repair it[Query] SELECT t.*, f.name FROM forum_thread t, forum_forum f WHERE f.status<>'3' AND f.fid=t.fid AND f.fid not IN(99,110,108,150,151,125,68,177,179,174,89,172,182,188,219,218,239,238,258,259,260,265,266,290,296,155,239,349,238,182,399,431) AND t.displayorder not IN(-1,-2) ORDER BY t.dateline DESC LIMIT 0, 10
 Program messages:[Line: 0055]forum.php(runhooks)[Line: 1192]source/function/function_core.php(hookscript)[Line: 1234]source/function/function_core.php(plugin_kk_xshow_forum->index_top)[Line: 0084]source/plugin/kk_xshow/xshow.class.php(plugin_kk_xshow_forum->update_thread)[Line: 0178]source/plugin/kk_xshow/xshow.class.php(kk_xshow_query)[Line: 0020]source/plugin/kk_xshow/xshow.func.php(DB::query)


www.mcbbs.net 已经将此出错信息详细记录, 由此给您带来的访问不便我们深感歉意 
怎么解决？

replies.author: MC大湿
replies.txt_content:
刚才我也出现了这种情况 还有各种502 504 应该是论坛本身的问题 详情问管理员

现在好了 楼主可以放心浏览Mcbbs 

选我为最佳

MC大湿 发表于 2014-1-17 17:13 
刚才我也出现了这种情况 还有各种502 504 应该是论坛本身的问题 详情问管理员

现在好了 楼主可以放心 ...
哦
